caption: Fetch ERC-1155 Metadata
doc: Get metadata for a ERC-1155 NFT.

AKS.caption: NFT Contract Address
AKS.doc: The NFT contract address of the ERC-1155 you are fetching metadata from.
AKS.name: nft_contract_address

AKT.caption: Token ID
AKT.doc: The NFT token ID of the ERC-1155 you are fetching metadata from.
AKT.name: token_id

AKU.caption: RPC URL
AKU.doc: Provide a RPC url for the network the NFT you are fetching information from is deployed on. Mainnet example: https://main-light.eth.linkpool.io
AKU.name: default_provider
